snippet: A unit of the bank had filed suit in March in an attempt to determine the property’s ownership and collect on a $90 million award against an Indian real estate developer.
abstract: Federal Judge Alison J Nathan rules against JPMorgan Chase in its attempt to subpoena documents that might prove luxury condominium in Time Warner Center is owned by Indian real estate developer Kabul Chawla; bank hoped to establish true ownership of apartment as part of attempt to collect on $90 million judgement against Chawla and his companies.
lead_paragraph: A unit of the bank had filed suit in March in an attempt to determine the property’s ownership and collect on a $90 million award against an Indian real estate developer.

headline.main: Judge Rejects JPMorgan’s Effort to Investigate Time Warner Center Condo
headline.print_headline: Judge Rejects Bank’s Effort to Investigate Costly Condo
